settings.title: MEN ACTIVE INGREDIENTS
settings.text:
Dutasteride is clinically more effective than finasteride and has a longer half-life – meaning you only need to use it once a day for effectiveness.

Minoxidil has shown for years to be an effective treatment for hair loss at 5%.

Bimataprost was initially discovered to grow eye lashes.  Clinical studies have shown that topical bimataprost can also support the growth of hair on the scalp.

Cetirizine racemate – A clinical study has demonstrated that topical cetirizine racemate increased the total hair density, terminal hair density and hair diameter in men with androgenetic alopecia.

Caffeine increases micro-circulation and local oxygen supply which has been shown to increase hair re-growth.

Melatonin is an anti-oxidant which has also been shown to stimulate hair re-growth.

settings.title: WOMEN ACTIVE INGREDIENTS
settings.text:
Minoxidil has shown for years to be an effective treatment for hair loss at 5%.  5% is no longer just for men.

Canrenone is the active metabolite of spironolactone.  Clinical studies have shown that androgen hormones can contribute to pattern hair loss in women.  Spironolactone and canrenone block the docking sites or receptors that androgens use making androgens less active allowing for more hair growth.

Latanoprost was initially discovered to grow eye lashes.  Clinical studies have shown that topical latanoprost can also support the growth of hair on the scalp.

Caffeine increases micro-circulation and local oxygen supply which has been shown to increase hair re-growth.

Melatonin is an antioxidant which has also been shown to stimulate hair re-growth.
